Review Name: Undoubtedly, A Great Product ! Review Description: It has been almost 2 months since I got this AC. It has a flawless operation. Cooling is great and the noise level is also quite low. Delivery service from flipkart was as great as always and the installation process was also carried out very well by voltas servicemen. The whole process from buying the AC online till its installation is seamless. Great product that one can go for without any second thoughts.
